title: Data Use Policy
overview: This policy outlines how PopData Insights uses, shares, and publishes population data.

content.description: Population data is used internally for analysis, research, and development of new products.
We may share population data with academic institutions, government agencies, and other partners.
Aggregated population data is published in public reports and research papers.
Certain datasets are made available to the public under open data licenses.
We ensure ethical considerations are applied in the use and dissemination of population data.
We protect individual privacy in the datasets by anonymizing sensitive information.
